pt.description:
**Please note HARVEST MOON: Seeds of Memories is compatible with iPhone 5S or later, iPad Air 1 or later, iPad Mini 2 or later, and iPod Touch 6 or later devices.**


A Memorable Harvest Moon Experience!

The original farming and life simulation game that started it all is now available on iOS with a full Harvest Moon experience and original story!
 
Tasked with the job of revitalizing a farm, you'll need to befriend the villagers in town to unlock the Seeds of Memories! 
You might get one by giving a villager their favorite item, catching a giant fish, or by raising your first cow!
 
FEATURES
 ● Grow a variety of crops, flowers, and trees! See if you can discover new kinds of mutations!
 ● Raise livestock like cows, sheep, and chickens! 
 ● Take your horse for a jaunt around town! 
 ● Take care of pets like your trusty dog! 
 ● With 10 marriageable candidates -- 5 guys and 5 gals -- everyone will be able to find that special someone they're looking for!
 ● Upgrade your tools to find the highest-quality items! 
 ● Participate in contests and festivals like the Cooking Contest and Starry Night Festival!
 ● Cook, fish, forage, and mine to your heart’s content!
 
Harvest Moon has always been about building a successful life, which means running a successful farm, and also building a meaningful life with friends and family. It is completely up to you on how you accomplish that!
 
Are you up to the challenge of collecting all of the Seeds of Memories?

pt.releaseNotes: Dynamic mode bug fixes.
pt.description:
This eye-care extension enables night mode by creating dark themes for websites on the fly. Dark Reader inverts bright colors, making web pages high contrast and easier to read at night. It perfectly suits system dark mode.

The app includes multiple beautiful color themes. Choose between dark mode, colored, dimmed and screen shader themes, or create your own by tuning background and text colors. Enable or disable the extension for specific websites, auto-toggle based on system dark mode preferences, or activate dark theme detection to leave already dark websites untouched.

Dark Reader's algorithms have been developed since 2014 by experts in the web development industry and evolve alongside modern web technologies to deliver fast and reliable dark mode support.

Dark Reader doesn't show ads and doesn't collect any data.

Before you install, disable similar extensions. Activate Dark Reader in Safari preferences. Enjoy browsing!

pt.releaseNotes: Bug fixes
pt.description:
Leave your laptop behind. Enjoy the freedom to work from anywhere.   

Jump Desktop is a remote desktop application that lets you securely connect to any computer in the world. Compatible with both RDP and VNC, Jump Desktop is secure, reliable and very easy to set up. Jump Desktop also supports our own, high performance, next generation remote desktop protocol called Fluid Remote Desktop. 

Easy setup and reliable:
Jump Desktop is very easy to setup; anyone can do it! Just visit: https://jumpdesktop.com on your PC or Mac, click the ‘Automatic Setup’ link and follow step-by-step instructions. You’ll be up and running in no time. Also - not subscriptions!

Secure:
Jump encrypts the connection between computers to ensure privacy and security. Automatic connections are always encrypted by default. Supports NLA, TLS/SSL encryption for RDP. SSH Tunnelling and SSL/TLS encryption for VNC. Fluid Remote Desktop uses DTLS for secure connections.

Powerful features:
* Works with almost any computer and operating system.
* Supports physical mice! On iOS 13 and iPadOS, Jump Desktop supports the accessibility mouse with some limitations. Jump Desktop also supports special physical mice with no limitations. For more information visit https://jumpdesktop.com/mice. 
* Fluid Remote Desktop protocol supports high performance remote desktop and audio.
* Easy and secure setup: Automatically configure your PC or Mac for remote access using Wi-Fi/3G/LTE without worrying about your router settings. Setup as many computers as you like – there are no limits! 
* Built for iPad Pro, iPad, iPhone and iPod
* iPad Pro features: Full support for split-screen multitasking and Apple Pencil. 
* Open multiple simultaneous connections
* Live connection previews
* Protect your server settings using Touch ID
* Connection syncing via iCloud connection syncing
* Advanced Bluetooth keyboard: The best bluetooth keyboard support on the App Store. Shortcuts, function keys and arrow keys - everything works. Also includes macros for keys no available on bluetooth keyboards (i.e function keys)
* SSH tunneling with password and public key authentication supported
* Supports large custom screen resolutions and VGA/HDMI out 
* Full mouse support via touch gestures: left, right and middle button clicks, dragging, scrolling, precision pointer movement
* Multiple gesture support - includes the ability to draw or write using your finger
* Copy/paste: Transfer text to or from your computer using the pasteboard
* HDMI/VGA external monitor support: View your desktop on an external monitor using a cable or AirPlay. Jump Desktop will let you utilize you external display as a true monitor (not as a mirror like other apps on the store). 
* Multi-core rendering engine makes Jump Desktop one of the fastest RDP and VNC engines on the planet
* Full support for Linea and Infinea barcode and MSR scanners. Includes support for E2E encryption.

RDP features:
* Supports RD Gateway
* Supports custom resolutions. Set any resolution you want including Retina resolutions.
* Dynamic RDP resolution updates on Windows 8.1+
* Remote printing: Send print outs from your computer to your iPad/iPhone device (exclusive RDP print redirection feature on the App Store!)
* Folder sharing
* Audio streaming
* Console sessions
* International keyboard layouts
* Multiple monitor support on Windows 7+
* Multi-touch redirection support on Windows 8+

Fluid Features:
* Super high performance, adaptive remote desktop
* Audio streaming 
* Strong encryption built into the protocol
* Connect from anywhere, even restricted networks without requiring networking knowledge
* Clipboard sharing

VNC features:
* Tested with Mac OS X, TightVNC, RealVNC, UltraVNC, Linux (Ubuntu Remote Desktop)
* Secure: Supports SSH tunneling as well as SSL encryption
* Black & white, gray scale, 8, 16 and 24-bit color to help optimize bandwidth
* Multiple monitor support
* Macs: Support locking the Mac's screen and syncing the pasteboard

pt.description:
Take back control of your browsing experience. Trackless Links Pro is the universal Safari extension for iPhone, iPad, and Mac that removes tracking parameters, enables custom redirects, and gives you control over website behaviors.

UNIVERSAL PURCHASE - ONE APP, ALL YOUR DEVICES
Buy once and enjoy Trackless Links Pro on iPhone, iPad, and Mac. Your settings sync seamlessly via iCloud - start on your Mac and continue on your iPhone or iPad without missing a beat.

WHAT IT DOES
• Removes tracking parameters (utm_*, fbclid, gclid, etc.) before they follow you around
• Custom redirects (e.g. reddit → old.reddit) with plain text or regex patterns
• Share Sheet integration - open links from any app to clean or archive them
• Quick access to archived web pages via Wayback Machine and other services
• Optional tweaks: stop autoplay, restore text selection, prevent exit popups, and more

WHY IT'S USEFUL
Cleaner links are easier to share. Redirects save time. Archive access finds cached versions of changed pages. Everything runs locally - no accounts, no data collection, no external services.

TRACKING BLOCKER
Removes common tracking parameters on the fly. Nothing leaves your devices.

URL REDIRECTS
Create and reorder custom rules. Includes 20+ predefined redirects focusing on privacy and alternative frontends (Reddit, Twitter/X, YouTube, Medium, and more). Disable or enable individually. Regex supported.

SEARCH ARCHIVE
One-tap access to cached web page snapshots via Wayback Machine. Access from the extension popup on any device.

iCLOUD SYNC
Keep settings synchronized across all devices. Filters, redirects, and tweaks sync automatically and immediately. Set it up once - your preferences follow you everywhere (statistics remain device-specific).

BROWSER TWEAKS
Selective opt-in controls: copy/select unlock, autoplay block, playback speed lock, PiP enable, URL clean-on-copy, redirector bypass, cookie banner suppression (experimental), dark mode, zoom limit removal, animation reduction, and more. Configure once, works everywhere.

KEY FEATURES
• Universal Purchase - one price for iPhone, iPad, and Mac
• Complete privacy - everything runs on your devices (zero data collection)
• Native apps for iOS, iPadOS, and macOS with full feature parity
• Seamless iCloud sync keeps everything synchronized automatically
• Share from anywhere - open links from Reddit, X, and other apps
• Fully customizable with personal filter and redirect rules
• Advanced pattern matching with regex support for power users
• Lightning-fast execution that loads before pages finish rendering
• Ultra-lightweight with no battery drain or background activity
• Works offline - no internet connection required

DESIGN PRINCIPLES
Plain language. User control. No dark patterns. Opt-in for anything that might change page behavior. One purchase, all platforms.

IMPORTANT NOTES
Tweaks may not work on all websites due to varying designs and security policies. All tweaks can be disabled if they cause issues. Cookie banner management is experimental.

SUPPORT & FEEDBACK
Bug reports and feature requests: https://github.com/aloth/trackless-links/issues

PRIVACY
No tracking, analytics, remote calls, or data retention. Everything runs on-device.

EULA
Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

READY FOR CLEANER BROWSING EVERYWHERE?
Download Trackless Links Pro - fast, private, and on your terms.

pt.description:
OVERVIEW

	— ADVANCED RAW: Unlock the power of Apple's RAW engine with easy-to-use controls. Develop images with the same outstanding RAW processing in Apple’s Aperture professional photo app. Unique adjustments let you improve your images in ways that can't be done in any other app. 

	— ORGANIZE: RAW Power is a complete photo app to organize and manage your photo library. Fully compatible with iCloud Photo Library, so all changes are synced. Every image and every change is available to every app on your iPhone or iPad.

	— RATE & FILTER: Filter albums by file type, rating, flag, and edit state. Ratings and Flags sync over iCloud Photo Library!

	— FILES.APP: Store images in the Photos library or Files.app. Use our new Share extension to import from other apps directly into RAW Power’s Files container. Same non-destructive editing, rating, and filtering features! (iCloud syncing is not supported).

	— NOT JUST RAWs: RAW Power is great with JPEGs, with many tools missing from the Photos app. Plus an innovative Depth Effect for photos shot on iPhones with a dual camera system. 

	— EDIT CROSS-PLATFORM: Edit on iOS and continue on the Mac (or vice-versa) using RAW Power 3 for macOS. 
	— BATCH PROCESSING: Apply presets, paste adjustments, and export multiple images. Export to the photo library or to Files.app.

Using iOS 16 or later? You may be interested in Nitro Photo. It includes masking, XMP support, synchronized Pan and Zoom and many other features. Search for 'Nitro Photo' on the App Store.

ORGANIZATION AND DISPLAY

	— Zoom up to 800% for extremely precise adjustments.

	— Create and rename albums, delete images from albums and the library, and move images into albums. Full access to your folder hierarchy.

	— Display file name, exposure information, flash status, and location with a map.

REAL-TIME EDITING

	— Full non-destructive editing. All changes stored in the iOS Photo Library and iCloud Photo Library, so you can edit on one device and continue on another, without loss of quality. Even between Mac and iOS!

	— Optimized for small screens. Choose which adjustments to show by default and in what order

	— Unparalleled highlight recovery with Boost and Recovery sliders. Real-time control of Apple's RAW engine, including Noise Reduction, Black Point, Gamut Mapping and more

	— Auto Enhance, Auto White Balance, Auto Levels and Auto Curves. Apply them to multiple images at once!

	— Apply presets, and Copy / Paste Adjustments to one image or many

	— Histogram with Clipping Indicators and Hot Pixels Overlay

	— LUTs (Look up tables) with built-in looks and film simulations. Add your own!

	— Crop and Straighten, Rotate and Flip, White Balance with sampler and auto 

	— Highlights, Shadows, Vibrancy, Local Contrast and incredible Lighten and Darken sliders

	— Curves and Levels. Curves has Linear and Lab modes, and samplers

	— Depth Effect to enhance photos shot with the dual camera system

	— Chromatic Aberration to correct lens artifacts, Perspective, Black & White, Vignette with a controllable center point

	— All sliders are real-time and GPU accelerated

	— High-precision, deep color imaging engine

	— Export JPEG, PNG, and TIFFs (8- and 16-bit) to Files.app or Photos.app


COMPATIBILITY

	— Compatible with hundreds of cameras, including iPhone RAW images. (EXTENDED SUPPORT REQUIRES iOS 14. Full List at https://www.gentlemencoders.com/extended-raw/index.html) RAW support is downloaded in the background by Apple. Your device must be on WiFi and plugged in to get updates.

	— Great with JPEGs, TIFFs, PNGs, and most DNGs

	— Video Tutorials (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7l78rOzFxaHG-e5AT-MGWQ)


RAW POWER for MAC

RAW Power is also available on the Mac App Store as a Photos Extension and standalone app with Photos Library support. Rated 4.5 stars worldwide!


ABOUT GENTLEMEN CODERS

Gentlemen Coders was founded by a former Senior Director of Engineering at Apple. For more information, visit www.gentlemencoders.com.

pt.description:
HUDDLE UP FOR BACKYARD FOOTBALL

Backyard Football 1999 is now enhanced to run on modern systems. Whether you're picking Jerry Rice or Barry Sanders for your dream team, rushing with Pete Wheeler, scoring touchdowns with Pablo Sanchez, or enjoying the witty banter of hosts Sunny Day and Chuck Downfield, simple controls let anyone pick up and play football!

GAME MODES
Single Game: With 5 backyard fields and unique weather condition settings, players can pick their team, design their team logos, and play a pick-up game!
Season Mode: Players can draft seven players from the 30 iconic Backyard Sports characters and a collection of legendary pros including Barry Sanders, Jerry Rice, John Elway, Dan Marino, Randall Cunningham, Drew Bledsoe and Steve Young to compete against 15 other teams in the Backyard Football League. Each team plays a 14-game season. By the end of the regular season, the 4 division champions and 4 wild card teams enter the Backyard Football League Playoffs to compete for the Super Colossal Cereal Bowl!

EARN CLASSIC POWER UPS
Earn power-ups by completing passes on offense and sacking the opposing QB on defense.

Offensive
• Hocus Pocus – A pass play which results in a receiver teleporting down field.
• Sonic Boom – A run play which causes an earthquake to knock over the opposing team.
• Leap Frog – A run play which causes your running back to leap down field.
• Super Punt – A very powerful punt!

Defensive
• Cough Drop – A play that causes the opponent to fumble when tackled.
• Chameleon – A trick play that results in your team wearing the other team's colors for ultimate confusion.
• Spring Loaded – A play that causes your player to leap over the line of scrimmage to sack the QB.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
At our core, we are fans first – not just of video games, but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver.

Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. However, Backyard Football ‘99 runs well, looks better than ever, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the game.

pt.releaseNotes: - Optimizations and compatibility improvements
pt.description:
STEP UP TO THE PLATE
Relive the second baseball game in the Backyard Sports franchise, now enhanced to run on iOS. Whether you're picking your dream team, playing a pick-up game, or diving into a full season, step up to the plate and experience the game that made baseball fun for everyone!

Backyard Baseball ‘01 teams up the Backyard kids with Backyardified MLB legends. Create your own Backyard team, customize your uniforms, and strategize to win the Championship. Play a single pick-up game or play through an entire season. Backyard Baseball ‘01 features intuitive controls for all ages!

SWING BACK INTO BASEBALL
Enjoy baseball like it’s 2001!
30 Charming Backyard kids
Legendary MLB Players
MLB Team Marks
Hilarious Bloopers
8 Classic Ballparks
9 Pitching Power-ups and 4 batting Power-ups
Lively commentary from Sunny Day and Vinnie

To get into the swing of things, choose a batter and face Mr. Clanky for some batting practice. This is where you’ll learn just when to click to make your chosen batter hit the ball!

THE GOAT RETURNS
Play with the legend himself, Pablo Sanchez. Build a roster from a cast of 30 hilarious child athletes and 28 legendary pros that made Backyard Baseball ‘01 a sports classic. Returning MLB players include Derek Jeter, Alex Rodriguez, Cal Ripken Jr., Sammy Sosa, Mike Piazza, Randy Johnson, Nomar Garciaparra, Jeff Bagwell, Jason Giambi, Chipper Jones, Jeromy Burnitz, Mark McGwire, Shawn Green, Vladimir Guerrero, Kenny Lofton, Jason Kendall, Barry Larkin, Marty Cordova, Mo Vaughn, Raul Mondesi, Curt Schilling, Alex Gonzalez, Juan Gonzalez, Larry Walker, Carlos Beltran, Tony Gwynn, Ivan Rodriguez, and Jose Canseco.

Game Modes include:
Choose from three modes of play (Easy Mode, Medium Mode, Hard Mode)
Random Pick-up: A quick way to jump right in! The computer chooses a random team for you and itself and the game starts immediately.
Single Game: You take turns with the computer choosing players from a random pool of characters.
Season: You pick your home field, create a team, and manage the team through a 14 game series. The opposing teams are computer generated. At the end of the season, the best two teams advance to the BBL playoffs (best of 3). If you keep winning, you’ll compete in the Super Entire Nation Tournament and Ultra Grand Championship of the Universe Series!

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
At our core, we are fans first – not just of video games, but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver.

Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. As an example, we can’t use the original 32bit code to support modern macOS, as even with an incredibly clever wrapper, macOS can’t execute the binaries.

Backyard Baseball ‘01 runs well, looks better than ever, includes new bonus features to test your mettle, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the game.

pt.description:
Rediscover the joy of the original Backyard Baseball 1997! Build your roster from the iconic cast of 30 characters stacked with charming personalities and witty banter, and get the edge on the competition with power-ups, fireball pitches, super strength, and Pablo Sanchez!
Play pick-up games, practice batting, and compete in single games or a whole season with simple, intuitive controls that anyone can master!
Game Modes:
Random Pick-up: A quick way to jump right in! The computer chooses a random team for you and itself, and the game starts immediately.
Single Game: You take turns with the computer to choose players from a random pool of characters.
Season: You create a team and manage it through a 14 game series. The opposing teams are computer generated. At the end of the season the best two teams advance to the BBL playoffs (best of 3). The winner advances to the championship series which consists of the Super Entire Nation Tournament (best of 3) and then the Ultra Grand Championship of the Universe Series (best of 5)!
Batting Practice: Choose a batter and face Mr. Clanky for some batting practice. This is where you’ll learn just when to click to make your chosen batter hit that ball!
T-ball - Select T-ball mode for more accessible game play. Simply click to hit, run, and field!
 
BACKYARD BASEBALL RULES
The rules for Backyard Baseball are a hybrid of Pro and Little League rules:
No leading off
No Injuries
Bunting is allowed
Tagging up is allowed
Stealing is allowed
 
At our core, we are fans first–not just of video games but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver. Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. Backyard Baseball '97 runs buttery smooth for iOS devices, looks better than ever, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the title that started it all.

pt.description:
AudioTools from Studio Six Digital is a suite of professional-grade audio and acoustic analysis apps. Included in the price of this app is a great collection of professional tools -- SPL, RTA, FFT, Speaker Polarity Test, Generator, Audio Scope, CLF Viewer, and Recorder, and the framework to add more powerful modules as you need them.

Customize AudioTools for your needs by buying any of the additional optional modules, like Smaart Tools I, SPL Graph, or Impulse Response, at any time right from your iOS device.

We test every iOS device and calibrate the microphone level and frequency response for the best results. We have the ability to turn off the Apple low frequency filters, and on many devices we can measure up to 120 dB SPL.

Add iTestMic, iPrecisionMic, or iAudioInterface2 for a complete professional audio and acoustic test and measurement platform.

Actual reviews:

“...AudioTools is a “how did I ever live without it” app”.

“I think this application is the best I EVER purchased.”

“I have used many thousands of dollars of complicated test equipment that doesn’t measure up to this app suite.”

***** Included in the app price *****

* SPL Meter
A faithful reproduction of a classic analog SPL meter. Includes A and C weighting, and Fast and Slow ANSI decay modes. All filters meet or exceed ANSI type 1.

* RTA
A 1/3 and octave band Real Time Analyzer. Includes touch-GUI range control, a cursor, max/min bars, and noise curve overlays. 

* FFT
Detailed acoustic analysis, up to 32876 points. View full detail or smooth to 1/24, 1/6, 1/3 or octave. Includes cursor, scalable graphics, and peak tracking.

* Polarity
Speaker polarity checker. Route the test signal to a speaker, and read the polarity of the speaker on the screen.

* CLF Viewer
Show loudspeaker data, including plots for impedance, axial response, sensitivity, polar response, and 6dB coverage, and a 3D color balloon plot. 

* Delay Finder
Measures the time it takes for a pulse to return from a speaker. 

* Generator
Generates sine waves, square waves, white and pink noise.

* Line Level Tests
A line level measurement function and frequency counter.

* Audio Scope
A dual-channel audio oscilloscope that includes auto-triggering, variable gain and sweep rate, and storage of scope images.

* Recorder
A mono/stereo audio recorder with WAV and compressed formats and 8k-48k sample rate. Transfer files via WIFI.

* File transfer of results via wifi to PC / Mac.

* Audio Calculators

***** Optional modules available for purchase from within AudioTools *****

* SoundScope VR - FFT-based audio analyzer with VR.
The powerful acoustical analysis module. Includes RTA graphs to 1/48th octave and Spectrograph, and can display VR.

* Transfer Function -- Requires 2-channel interface. 
Two-channel FFT-based measurement. Allows you to analyze sound system performance with music or pink noise as the signal source.

* ETC
Energy Time Curve. Plot decay of an impulse over time, and compute RT60 time. Internal or External trigger.

* Impulse Response
Record and analyze an impulse or sine sweep, compute octave and 1/3 octave ETC, T30, C50, C80, CT, Definition.

* LARSA
Fast and accurate sine-sweep measurement of loudspeakers and rooms.

* SPL Pro
Digital SPL meter with ANSI Slow, Fast, Peak, and Impulse mode, along with LEQ. Includes A and C weighting, and all 10 octave band filters.

* SPL Graph
Plot second-by-second SPL level for up to 24 hours, and optionally record the audio. Also, add the optional Octave Band Logging upgrade to elevate this tool to rival any professional logging SPL Meter.

* SPL Traffic Light
Monitor live sound levels SPL and Leq and see status in a simple green-yellow-red display.

* STIPA Speech Intelligibility
Meets the current NFPA code standards for testing evac systems and schools.

* Speaker Distortion
Measure THD+n of any driver.

* THD+n (requires iAudioInterface)

* Impedance Meter and Plot (requires iAudioInterface)

* Phase Meter

* Amplitude Sweep

pt.description:
Abra o seu caminho através das hordas da escuridão e derrote os temíveis guardiões do Rei Valor nesta aventura de RPG de tirar o fôlego!

"Encadear uma série de ataques, desvios e saltos é incrivelmente satisfatório". - PocketGamer

"Eu suspeito que os fãs de jogos para dispositivos móveis jogarão este nos próximos anos". - TouchArcade, 5/5

Um poder malicioso se agita no reino esquecido de Vallaris. Você foi encarregado de descobrir o destino do rei perdido, mas rapidamente a sua missão toma um rumo sinistro e você é lançado na escuridão. Cercado e em menor número, você deve pegar sua espada, fortalecer seu temperamento e abrir caminho por uma terra onde você não é bem-vindo. Exceto por um comerciante amigável, pois ele é grato pelo seu negócio.

SOBRE O JOGO
O Grimvalor é um jogo de plataforma desafiador de hack-and-slash com combate em ritmo acelerado em um mundo sombrio de fantasia. Assuma o controle de um guerreiro solitário que tem a missão de restaurar um reino corrompido. Embarque em uma jornada por meio de paisagens atmosféricas e masmorras em uma enorme experiência premium baseada em histórias.

COMBATE E EXPLORAÇÃO
Domine o combate baseado em habilidades, aprenda os padrões de inimigos e derrube-os com toda a sua fúria. Explore as terras destruídas de Vallaris, encontre e melhore os equipamentos e leve seu personagem ao próximo nível. Encare o legado da loucura do rei Valor e prevaleça!

RECURSOS
• Lutas épicas com chefes
• Visuais 3D impressionantes, acelerados pelos gráficos de Metal
• Renderização Silky 120 FPS suave em dispositivos iPad Pro da 2° e 3° geração
• Controles com toque precisos e personalizáveis
• Suporte completo para controladores de jogos MFi
• Use o iCloud para salvar e mantenha a sincronização entre dispositivos.
• Jogue offline - perfeito para comutar.
• Não há anúncios ou compras no aplicativo

Se estiver encontrando problemas ou não estiver satisfeito, nos avise (support@strongboxsafe.com) e resolveremos.

pt.description:
O Strongbox é uma aplicação para manter todas suas senhas armazenadas com segurança e protegidas por uma senha mestra. São suportados of formatos abertos PasswordSafe e KeePass.

*** Funcionalidades ***
- Desbloqueio com Face ID/Touch ID para garantir a maior conveniência, segurança e velocidade de acesso possiveis.

- Desbloqueio com Código PIN com opção de PIN sob Coerção para lidar com situações difíceis.

- Proteção YubiKey - proteja suas bases de dados com um token físico.

- Seguro - protegido por criptografia de nível militar.

- Privativo - Um visualizador de anexos embutido no aplicativo protege seus documentos, fotos e vídeos.

- Audite suas senhas - Automaticamente consulte se sua base de dados contém senhas fracas, incluindo consultas com o 'Have I Been Pwned'.

- Suporte a Nuvem, para que você consiga acessar seus cofres armazenados no iCloud, Dropbox, OneDrive, Google Drive, WebDAV ou SFTP mesmo quando estiver offline. Use o app Arquivos para ter muito mais opções de armazenamento ou guarde seu cofre de maneira segura apenas no seu dispositivo. Você escolhe onde guardar seu cofre.

- Consulte todas as suas senhas e segredos instantaneamente usando uma busca poderosa e profunda. Autocomplete novos registros e gere automaticamente senhas seguras.

- Compatível - Importe/Exporte usando o app Arquivos, Email, CSV, Compartilhamento de Arquivos do iTunes ou armazenamento na nuvem.

- Padrões da Indústria - São usados os formatos já testados pelo tempo Password Safe e KeePass, então você pode importar qualquer cofre de senhas que tiver.

- Abundância de Funcionalidades
	- Geração de senhas incrivelmente configurável incluindo Diceware (XKCD) e senhas normais.
	- Auto limpeza da área de transferência após tempo definido.
	- Histórico de registro.
	- Referências de Campos do KeePass, Etiquetas, Ícones Personalizados, FavIcons (incluindo busca e download automáticos).
	- Suporte a geração de códigos de Autenticação em Duas Etapas (TOTP) - QR Codes, Steam e Manuais.
	
	*** O Strongbox é Freemium ***
Isso significa que o Strongbox é gratuito com um conjunto básico de funcionalidades, mas se você quiser existem funcionalidades melhoradas na versão Pro. Você pode se inscrever em um Período de Testes Gratuito por 90 dias para testar todas as funcionalidades Pro que quiser, sem obrigações, mas a maioria das pessoas considera a versão gratuita perfeitamente adequada.

---------------------------------------------------------------------
• O Strongbox provê Compras no Aplicativo (tanto para assinaturas auto renováveis quanto para o pagamento único) das versões Pro do App.
• Uma opção de pagamento adiantado (que não é feita dentro do App) também existe, consulte o site do Strongbox para mais detalhes.
• Assinaturas são auto renováveis com pagamentos recorrentes. Cancele a qualquer momento.
• Os períodos de tempo das assinaturas são mensal, trimestral ou anual, à escolha do usuário.
• O usuário também pode escolher comprar, com um pagamento único, uma versão Pro vitalícia do App.
• O pagamento será cobrado da sua Conta iTunes na confirmação da compra.
• A assinatura é renovada automaticamente a menos que a auto renovação seja desativada com pelo menos 24 horas de antecedência do fim do período atual.
• A Conta iTunes será cobrada pela renovação dentro das 24 horas antecedentes ao fim do período atual, e identificará o custo da renovação.
• Assinaturas podem ser gerenciadas e a auto renovação pode ser desligada na página de Configuração da Conta após a compra.
• Qualquer porção não utilizada do período de testes, se oferecido, será revogada quando o usuário comprar uma assinatura onde aplicável.
• A Política de Privacidade pode ser encontrada aqui: https://strongboxsafe.com/privacy-policy
• Os Termos de Uso podem ser encontrados aqui: https://strongboxsafe.com/terms

pt.description:
RCS: Real Combat Simulator – Domine os Céus!
A Experiência de Combate Aéreo Militar Definitiva para Celular

Assuma o controle no simulador de voo militar mais avançado: pilote caças lendários, participe de combates aéreos épicos, domine o combate ar-ar e ar-terra e prove sua habilidade como piloto de combate de elite.

Voe e Lute em Qualquer Lugar do Mundo!!

- Domine decolagens, pousos e missões de combate completas
- Pilote jatos de última geração com aviônicos realistas e cabines detalhadas
- Acesse milhares de aeroportos e bases aéreas militares do mundo todo
- Treine com tutoriais interativos e aprimore suas habilidades de combate

Caças Realistas:
Voe com aeronaves fielmente recriadas com cabines dinâmicas, física de voo autêntica e sistemas de armas completos
- A-10C Thunderbolt II – A potência blindada de apoio aéreo aproximado, com o canhão GAU-8 Avenger e capacidade de ataque de precisão.
- F/A-18 Super Hornet – Um jato multifuncional versátil para porta-aviões com aviônicos avançados e amplo armamento, perfeito para combates aéreos e ataques de precisão.
- M-346FA Master – Um caça-treinador moderno e ágil, equipado com telas digitais e sensores avançados.
- F-16C Fighting Falcon – Emblemático caça multifuncional, valorizado por sua velocidade, agilidade e versatilidade. Equipado com radar avançado, controles de voo por sinais elétricos e uma gama de armas de precisão ar-ar e ar-terra.
Mais aeronaves em breve!

Recursos de Combate Imersivos:
- Zonas de batalha globais com clima e efeitos de hora do dia reais
- Radar avançado e sistemas de mira para ameaças aéreas e terrestres
- Arsenal completo de mísseis, bombas, canhões e contramedidas
- Manobras de alta velocidade e terreno baseado em satélite

Editor de Missão e Multijogador:
- Crie missões personalizadas: marque objetivos, controle o clima e defina a IA inimiga
- Construa suas próprias salas, crie cenários e voe em missões em conjunto no modo multijogador em tempo real
- Escolha seu Campo de Batalha: selecione entre locais realistas do mundo e bases aéreas militares
- Compartilhe suas criações e reviva suas melhores batalhas com ferramentas avançadas de replay

Personalize sua experiência:
- Personalize seu jato com pinturas e padrões de camuflagem autênticos
- Capture combates aéreos cinematográficos com câmeras avançadas no jogo
- Compartilhe seus destaques de combate com a comunidade RCS

Conexão com a internet é necessária para a simulação completa e os recursos multijogador. Alguns recursos podem exigir uma assinatura.

Baixe agora o simulador de voo militar definitivo! Pilote caças modernos, participe de intensas missões de combate aéreo e domine os céus no RCS: Real Combat Simulator.

TERMOS DE USO: https://www.rortos.com/terms-of-use/
Suporte: rcs@rortos.com

pt.description:
The ultimate system monitor, seamlessly integrated into your menubar.

iStat Menus covers a huge range of stats, including CPU, GPU, memory, network usage, disk usage, time, battery, weather and more. iStat Menus 7 is a full reboot, sporting an all-new design with hundreds of big and small improvements. iStat Menus is unmatched in efficiency, and is the most CPU-friendly system monitoring app.

• CPU and GPU •

Highly detailed CPU info, with current usage for individual cores, history graphs, load averages, uptime, CPU frequency, and a list of the apps using the most CPU. Efficiency and performance cores can be styled differently. Plus, GPU processor, memory, temperature, and frequency on supported Macs.

• Weather • Requires a paid weather subscription •

Quickly glance at current conditions in your menu bar, or dive into an incredibly detailed hourly forecast and weekly weather overview, covering low and high temperature, wind speed and direction, chance of rain, humidity, dew point, UV index, pressure, visibility and more.

• Memory •

Extensive memory stats covering usage, history, memory pressure, compressed memory, swap, and a list of the apps using the most memory.

• Rules •

iStat Menus can notify you of an incredibly wide range of events, based on CPU, GPU, memory, disks, network, sensors, battery, power and weather. This lets you be notified when your public IP has changed, if your internet connection is down, if CPU usage is above 60% for more than 10 seconds, if disk space is low, or a near-infinite range of other options.

• Disk usage and activity •

See used space, free space, and disk activity in your menu bar. S.M.A.R.T. status monitoring, per app disk usage, and more detail for all your disks is only a click away.

• Network •

Keep on top of what’s being sent and received for all network connections with history graphs, current bandwidth usage, and a bandwidth breakdown for the top apps, as well as detailed connection info, bandwidth graphs, public and private IP addresses, and an internet connectivity indicator.

• Battery and power •

Detailed info on your battery’s current state and a highly configurable menu item that can change if you’re draining, charging, or completely charged. Plus, battery levels for Bluetooth devices.

• Sensors •

A realtime listing of the sensors in your Mac, including temperatures, hard drive temperatures (where supported), fans, CPU frequency, GPU frequency (where supported), voltages, current and power. Fan speeds can be controlled, and even switched or gradually ramped based on temperatures and battery state.

• Date and time •

Highly customisable menu bar clocks, a calendar with upcoming events, and world clocks with detailed sun and moon info. Each world clock can have a custom name, to make it easier to see the time for coworkers or family members.

• Combined •

Combined mode combines multiple iStat Menus items into a single menu bar item. You can choose what’s shown in the menu bar and what’s shown in the menu, allowing you to save space in the menu bar while still having access to all the information. It’s super handy on laptops.

pt.description:
Whisper Notes - Transcrição Offline

Grave voz ou importe ficheiros áudio/vídeo para obter transcrições precisas—100% offline, no seu dispositivo.
Sem limites de gravação, sem subscrições, sem carregamentos na nuvem. Apenas $4.99, uma vez.

■ Funcionalidades principais
- Transcrição 100% offline—o seu áudio nunca sai do seu dispositivo
- Grave notas de voz, reuniões, palestras—duração ilimitada
- Importe ficheiros áudio/vídeo (MP3, M4A, WAV, MP4, MOV)—transcreva offline
- Extraia legendas de vídeos da sua Biblioteca—sem necessidade de carregar
- Mais de 100 idiomas suportados, deteção automática
- Exporte com marcações de tempo (SRT, VTT, TXT)
- Processe múltiplos ficheiros em lote

■ Privacidade e velocidade
As suas gravações ficam no seu iPhone/Mac, sempre. Sem necessidade de internet, sem carregamentos na nuvem, nunca.

Velocidade de transcrição: No iPhone 15, 5 minutos de áudio demoram cerca de 1 minuto. Dispositivos mais antigos são mais lentos, mas funcionam bem.

■ Preço
$4.99 pagamento único. Aplicações similares cobram mais de $100/ano em subscrições.
Sem taxas recorrentes, sem compras na aplicação, sem anúncios. Pague uma vez, use para sempre.
Não está satisfeito? Toque em Definições → Solicitar reembolso.

■ Perguntas frequentes

Funciona completamente offline?
Sim. O seu áudio nunca sai do seu dispositivo. Funciona em aviões, áreas remotas, em qualquer lugar.

Há limite de tempo para gravações?
Sem limite. Grave durante horas se quiser. Gravações mais longas apenas demoram mais tempo a transcrever no seu dispositivo.

Suporta transcrição em tempo real durante a gravação?
Não durante a gravação, mas sim durante a transcrição—depois de terminar de gravar, verá a transcrição aparecer em tempo real conforme é gerada.

Onde os meus dados são armazenados?
Apenas no seu dispositivo. Não temos acesso. Nota: Se eliminar a aplicação, as suas gravações também são eliminadas (porque não guardamos cópias de segurança secretas). Exporte ficheiros importantes regularmente.

Porquê sem resumos de IA?
Privacidade. Nunca carregamos as suas gravações para nenhum serviço de IA. Quer resumos? Copie a transcrição e use a sua ferramenta de IA preferida. Não prendemos os seus dados num sistema de IA proprietário.

Porque é que a transcrição para quando mudo de aplicação?
O iOS limita o uso de GPU em segundo plano para aplicações de terceiros. Simplesmente volte à aplicação e toque em "Retranscrever"—ela reiniciará.

Posso importar ficheiros áudio/vídeo existentes?
Sim. Importe ficheiros MP3, M4A, WAV, MP4, MOV e transcreva-os offline. Ótimo para extrair legendas de vídeos sem carregar para serviços na nuvem.

Que idiomas são suportados?
Mais de 100 idiomas incluindo: English, Deutsch, Español, Русский, 한국어, Français, 日本語, Português, Türkçe, Polski, Català, Nederlands, Arabic, Svenska, Italiano, Bahasa Indonesia, Hindi, Suomi, Tiếng Việt, Hebrew, Українська, Greek, Bahasa Melayu, Čeština, Română, Dansk, Magyar, Tamil, Norsk, Thai, Urdu, Hrvatski, Bulgarian, Lietuvių, Latina, Māori, Malayalam, Cymraeg, Slovenčina, Telugu, Persian, Latviešu, Bengali, Српски, Azərbaycan, Slovenščina, Kannada, Eesti, Macedonian, Brezhoneg, Euskara, Íslenska, Armenian, Nepali, Mongolian, Bosanski, Kazakh, Shqip, Kiswahili, Galego, Marathi, Punjabi, Sinhala, Khmer, chiShona, Yorùbá, Soomaali, Afrikaans, Occitan, Georgian, Belarusian, Tajik, Sindhi, Gujarati, Amharic, Yiddish, Lao, Uzbek, Føroyskt, Kreyòl Ayisyen, Pashto, Turkmen, Nynorsk, Malti, Sanskrit, Luxembourgish, Myanmar, Tibetan, Tagalog, Malagasy, Assamese, Tatar, Hawaiian, Lingala, Hausa, Bashkir, Javanese, Sundanese, 简体中文, 繁體中文

■ Contacto
Questões? Envie um email para support@whispernotes.app
Saiba mais: whispernotes.app
